General.Name: Silver Elephant Mining Corp
General.Description: Silver Elephant Mining Corp., a mineral exploration stage company, acquires, explores, and develops mineral and energy projects. The company explores for gold, nickel, silver, lead, zinc, iron, vanadium, titanium, and coal. Its flagship project is the Pulacayo project covering an area of 3,560 hectares located in Quijarro province, Bolivia. The company was formerly known as Prophecy Development Corp. and changed its name to Silver Elephant Mining Corp. in March 2020. Silver Elephant Mining Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
